executiveSummary: Junior entrepreneur Gavin, alongside his sister Morgan and father John from Orange County, California, pitched their product 'Glove Wrap'—an elastic band designed to break in baseball gloves easily. They sought $50,000 for 20% equity and ultimately secured a deal with sharks Mark Cuban and Michael Rubin for $50,000 in exchange for 22% equity, plus a commitment for future investment opportunities.
keyDecisions: Mark Cuban and Michael Rubin agreed to invest $50,000 for 22% equity in Glove Wrap.

actionItems.task: Meet with Big 5 Sporting Goods regarding retail placement of Glove Wrap.
Introduce Gavin and Glove Wrap to professional baseball players and major retailers through Fanatics’ network.
Ensure Gavin grants Mark and Michael right of first refusal on future ventures.

nextSteps: Gavin’s team will prepare for the upcoming meeting with Big 5 Sporting Goods while collaborating with Mark Cuban and Michael Rubin to expand retail and promotional partnerships in the baseball industry.
